item.title: Prime Focus Ltd Hits New 52-Week High, Marking Significant Market Milestone
item.description: Prime Focus Ltd has reached a new 52-week high, touching an intraday peak of ₹247.60, signalling a notable achievement in its market performance and reflecting sustained momentum in the Media & Entertainment sector. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Hindalco Industries Ltd Hits New 52-Week High, Marking Significant Milestone
item.description: Hindalco Industries Ltd has reached a new 52-week high, touching an intraday peak of ₹888, just 0.74% shy of its record price of ₹890.7. This achievement underscores the company’s sustained momentum in the Non - Ferrous Metals sector, reflecting robust financial performance and favourable market dynamics. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Cyient Ltd. Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend
item.description: Shares of Cyient Ltd., a key player in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, have declined to a fresh 52-week low, closing near Rs 1050.2. This marks a significant milestone in the stock’s ongoing downward trajectory, reflecting a series of financial setbacks and market pressures over the past year. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Vodafone Idea Ltd. Hits New 52-Week High, Marking Significant Rally
item.description: Vodafone Idea Ltd. has reached a significant milestone by touching its 52-week high of Rs 12.21, marking a notable rally in the telecom services sector. This achievement reflects sustained momentum supported by positive price action and technical indicators. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: R K Swamy Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amid Continued Underperformance
item.description: Shares of R K Swamy Ltd have declined to a fresh 52-week low, closing at Rs 115.8 on 30 Dec 2025, marking a significant drop from its peak of Rs 275 within the last year. This decline reflects ongoing challenges faced by the company within the Media & Entertainment sector, as it continues to underperform relative to broader market indices and sector peers. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Pudumjee Paper Products Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Pudumjee Paper Products Ltd has reached a new 52-week low, closing just 2.9% above its lowest price of Rs 90.3. item.title: Sensex and Nifty End Flat as Metal Sector Leads Gains; Mixed Market Breadth Evident
item.description: Indian equity benchmarks closed the penultimate trading day of 2025 marginally lower, with the Sensex slipping 20.46 points (-0.02%) to 84,675.08 and the Nifty 50 edging down 0.01% to 25,938.85. Despite the subdued overall performance, sectoral divergences were evident as the metal sector outperformed, while realty stocks lagged. Market breadth remained weak, reflecting cautious investor sentiment ahead of the new year. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Jayaswal Neco Industries Ltd Hits Intraday High with 7.07% Surge
item.description: Jayaswal Neco Industries Ltd recorded a robust intraday performance on 30 Dec 2025, surging to a new 52-week high of Rs 93.37, marking a 7.07% gain on the day and significantly outperforming the broader Sensex, which remained nearly flat with a marginal decline of 0.02%. Time: 2 hours ago

The stock has underperformed its sector and broader market indices, reflecting ongoing concerns about its financial health and valuation metrics. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Tracxn Technologies Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend
item.description: Tracxn Technologies Ltd has touched a fresh 52-week low, closing just 0.61% above its lowest price of Rs 38.91. item.title: PBM Polytex Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.48 Amid Continued Downtrend
item.description: PBM Polytex Ltd, a player in the Garments & Apparels sector, has touched a fresh 52-week low of Rs.48 today, marking a significant milestone in its ongoing decline.
